official_title: A bill to modify the flood control project for the Lower Mississippi River to authorize construction of the St. Johns Bayou and New Madrid Floodway, Missouri, project.

summary.text: Modifies the flood control project for the Lower Mississippi River to authorize the Secretary of the Army, through the Chief of Engineers, to construct the St. John's Bayou and New Madrid Floodway project, Missouri. Directs that necessary alterations and relocations of bridges shall be at Federal expense.

titles.title: A bill to modify the flood control project for the Lower Mississippi River to authorize construction of the St. Johns Bayou and New Madrid Floodway, Missouri, project.
